text: Viola biflora is a species of the genus Viola. It is also called alpine yellow-violet, arctic yellow violet, or twoflower violet. It is found in Europe, Siberia, Central Asia, Pakistan, western and northern China, North Korea, Japan, and Western North America. ==References== ==External links== * * biflora Category:Plants described in 1753 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Viola biflora
